verbs.description: [ARG0: pittsburgh residents] [V: stage] [ARG1: solemn protest] [ARGM-PRP: as trump makes unwelcome visit] residents of the squirrel hill community staged a solemn protest tuesday in opposition to donald trump unwelcome visit to the tree of life synagogue where 11 people were murdered saturday in an anti - semitic attack although trump was convinced by book lovers trump kos liberation league senate brian p kemp dmca georgia brett kavanaugh pittsburgh kerry eleveld brian kemp senator kos kos media gop
